text: Absence from work is a costly and disruptive problem for any organization. The cost of absenteeism in Australia has been put at 1.8 million hours per day or $1400 million annually. In 2015, a study was  conducted in the Prince William Hospital in Brisbane, Australia, where, prior to this time, few active steps  had_ been taken to measure, understand or manage the  occurrence  of absenteeism.
